title: Devoted: 38 Extraordinary Tales of Love, Loyalty, and Life With Dogs
description: Unlikely Friendships  meets  Marley and Me . This heartwarming gift book from National Geographic presents a collection of inspiring dog stories and touching photos—dogs who comfort veterans, dogs who learn to surf, dogs who detect cancer, and dogs who save the day: Each one is devoted. These 38 uplifting dog stories showcase the most amazing dog rescues, accomplishments, and abilities that fascinate us and touch our hearts.
author: Rebecca Ascher-Walsh
